body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, attorney and notary. England native. Married Sarah DeYoung Abraham in 1841. Father of John Abraham, Victor Abraham, Fanny Abraham, and Samuel Abraham. Employed Mary Liston and Mary Hastings as servants in Cincinnati in 1860. Attorney in Cincinnati in 1860 and 1863. Notary public for Hamilton County, Ohio in 1860 and 1863. Member of the Independent Order of B'Nai B'rith. Member of K. K. Bene Israel synagogue in Cincinnati.
